resources.string: Higher difficulties contain more monsters and more relics to find, but wins are worth a better high score!
YOU FOUND ALL OF THE RELICS AND ESCAPED!\nYOU WIN!
THE DUNGEON CLAIMS ANOTHER VICTIM!\nGAME OVER!

Objective: Collect all relics, then find the exit.

Explore: Flips over the first two cards if they are face down.

Memorize: Adds the top card to the memories pile if it is a number.

Retrace: Puts the selected card on top of the deck.

Traverse: Move through the dungeon based on the number of the card. After traversing, the card you landed on will be collected.
If it is a number card, it gets removed from the deck and added to the loot count.
If it's a relic, it gets removed from the deck and added to the relic count.
If it's a monster, you lose.
If it's the exit and you have all relics, then you win, otherwise nothing happens.

If at any point you can't traverse using the top two cards, you must retrace from the memories pile.
If there are no memories to retrace from, the game is lost.
